featured.text: You’ll get a different expression from your pet using this technique.
It involves a variety of techniques that make use of the hands, feet, legs, arms, and head.

definition.zh_def: 技術；方法，特定的操作或處理方式。
definition.en_def: A method or way of doing something, especially one that is systematic or established.
definition.example: She used a new technique to improve her painting skills.
